page.title: 10BARFORD Gables in Spaxton.
page.content: This large house was part of the notorious Agepenome Community. Recently it has become a residential home for the elderly. There are 9 residents in the home. One person has a room of her own,others share rooms. There are 7 bedrooms. The old people rise at 8,o,clock and have cereals and toast,tea or coffee for breakfast. For lunch they have fish cakes,salads,stews,and for tea they have baked beans,fish fingers,or scrambled egg. There are 2 cooks,1 nurse and several part_time domestic helpers. The old people have very few visitors. They go for walks,sit in the garden,watch television,read books,draw or paint.Sometimes they go on trips.
